name: Pet Owner Wireframe
description:
A wireframe mock for an online course assignment; this is my first wireframe so I would love any and all feedback!


Imagine that you are working on a website for pet owners to share advice. You are creating the first wireframe to show the developers and stakeholders.

You decide on a layout where the website has a large static banner across the entire top. There are key links below it, followed by a rotating display of animal pictures and tips. Then there are links to more sections below. You don't have the images or the content for anything, so for now you are creating placeholders with shapes, lines, and text.
